ygData.subject: Is Power Leveling bad?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, I have a general question. Is powerleveling a bad thing ?  I have fallen behind my friends ingame they all are 4-5 lvls at least ahead of me. This is
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all, I have a general question. Is powerleveling a bad thing ? I have
fallen behind my friends ingame they all are 4-5 lvls at least ahead of me.
This is due to my lack of playing time lately. I play alot too.. but work
the last few weeks is sucking up the time. So i want to catch up pretty
close to them. so they took me to lake rathier, and in a place close to
zone, where i can powerlevel and zone when i am bout ta croak. Is this
considered twinking ? i do the fighting, well as much as my mage can
handle.. but is this a bad thing to do ? is it banable ? i like it alot and
can level faster here..
